好: adjective 1 good; fine; nice (opp. 壞) 2 friendly; kind 3 be in good health; get well 4 be ready; done 5 [after verbs to indicate finishing or finishing satisfactorily] 6 [before verbs to denote what is satisfying] good; easy 7 [at the beginning of a sentence or clause  to express agreement  disapproval  surprise  etc.]  adverb 1 [before adjectives with exclamatory force] very; quite; so 2 dialect [before adjectives in the same way as 多] to what extent; how 3 [before indefinite time or numbers] quite  verb produce favourable effects  auxiliary 1 the better to; in order to; so that 2 dialect may; can; should
